title: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When using the external jar Build 200201151, there is a bug where search results are not being selected properly. To reproduce the bug, follow these steps: Searcg for references to this field5.
OB: When double-clicking on the search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: When double-clicking on the search result, the first match should be selected.
SR:
1. Open the external jar Build 200201151.
2. Perform a search for references to 'this field5'.
3. Double-click on the search result.
